title: When Will it Come to the PBE?
body: When is this update coming to the PBE?

replies.body: Some people said that its comeing after 1,3 month
signed in to upvote dis lol
Will we see it in PBE in 2014 or will we have to wait until 2015?
I'm pretty sure it will go to PBE sometime soon. I'd say before July.
I heard it won't even be fully finished until maybe 2 - 3 months after that but I don't remember that update video that well so I'm probably wrong

Well, if they do it like they do new champions or skins, then it'll actually be on PBE before it is finished. This obviously takes more time than either of those things, so it'll most likely be on PBE more than just one time. But you're right in that it will most likely take a few months to actually get it entirely finished for final PBE testing before the push to live.

From my point of view i'd say that the map is pretty much finished. It seems that there are only minor color adjustments and animations left to finish.
So i guess they will push the new map to the PBE before august.
But that's just speculation.

EDIT: Nevermind. It's already on PBE
well we cant discuss about the map unless if we work out the bugs lol

been a while what is PBE again

when i run my PBE admin launcher it wont load it just crashes.
They don't have a specific date.
It is on the PBE right now!
The update is on the PBE right now

Public Beta Environment- everything Riot does is released onto beta version before pushing it to the live servers
